attributes.title: DONT WASTE YOUR TIME!
attributes.review: This app is terrible a lot of glitches! Also it’s super slow. Keeps logging me out of my account. Also whenever I open the app it automatically closes. Such a waste!

attributes.title: this app is horrible
attributes.review: i hate this app it didn’t even work and trumps orange face didn’t make it any better this app needs to be banned because it’s a tracker and tracks your data to the white house DO NO TRUST THIS APP

attributes.title: this is awful
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app for the first time after i downloaded it, it made such a loud high-pitched sound that it broke the glass i was drinking out of and my dog started crying. it made my toes curl (and not in a good way). it’s sickening to see that this is on the app store and i am utterly disappointed in whoever produced it. i also kept getting pop-up ads that featured trumps nudes and i feel very violated 🤚

attributes.title: I died because of this app
attributes.review: This was the worst app ever created. I looked at the app for one second and I was dead. Do me a favor and never create this app ever again🧚🏻‍♂️✨✨. On behalf of Generation Z we all agree to get rid of this app for good

attributes.title: I almost died!
attributes.review: This awful app caused my skin to retract back into my body and I was flipped inside out! The second I opened the app and entered my phone number, as was asked, and i was reversed. I’m inside out how bc if this app

attributes.title: I’d rather have explosive diarrhea than open this app ever again in my life.
attributes.review: This app is the most deplorable computer program I’ve ever seen. The moment I installed it it began conducting a satanic ritual and killed my dog >:((. Oh yeah and Donald Trump’s a white supremacist.

attributes.title: Very Disappointed
attributes.review: I had high hopes for this app but unfortunately I was let down by the substandard content. This app was too slow to operate. I do not recommend downloading.

attributes.title: worst app I have ever seen 😡😡
attributes.review: I just wanted to show my support for the cheeto puff living in the White House but it turned my phone into and orange and started yelling white lives matter at me and i cried, one star #getthisappofftheappstore

attributes.title: This app is broken
attributes.review: Whenever I try to open the app, it'll load, and then crash. I've done this a few times now, nothing.

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: The worst app I’ve ever downloaded. Kept glitching ever second and turning off my phone, I think it might’ve been hacking it or something. Don’t recommend at ALL. Don’t risk it 🤞
